personalInfo.name: Sebastian
personalInfo.myDescription: Passionate web developer, making useful application using the latest technologies!

responsabilities: Responsible for designing, developing and maintaining a group of applications used in the retail industry by multinational companies as Pepsico, Unilever, Quilmes, etc.
Web Team leader, I take technical decisions about which technologies use in each project and how the team will works.
Backend Developer: .NET Core | .NET Framework | NodeJs | MSSQL | PostgreSQL | MongoDB.
Frontend Developer: VueJs | ReactJs | Javascript | JQuery.
Responsible for web ecommerce designing and maintaining.
Graphic design (Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator).

interests.title: Hobbies
